item.text:
Funding Applications Recycling Bin. With commects about what they failed, comments about funds and projects.


Learn from mistakes and upcycle: fix mistakes and weaknesses and go for the next funding application.
Psychological: also is an important one. Are rejected funding forms is something to be ashamed of and put of other funding opportunities?
Funding Applications Recycling Bin is a collection of projects which for one reason or another didnt get funded.
Learn from mistakes and upcycle: fix mistakes and weaknesses and go for the next funding application.
Are rejected funding forms is something to be ashamed of and put of other funding opportunities?
Learn from mistakes and upcycle: fix mistakes and weaknesses and go for the next funding application.
When we want to scale our project and seek for funding fundin bodies often can't tell us what was wrong with the application and why it didnt get through.

When we want to scale our project and seek for funding fundin bodies often can't tell us what was wrong with the application and why it didnt get through. Are rejected funding forms is something to be ashamed of and put of other funding opportunities?
Aim of this collection is to learn from mistakes and upcycle: fix mistakes and weaknesses and go for the next funding application.
Projects Archive
When we want to scale our project and seek for funding fundin bodies often can't tell us what was wrong with the application and why it didnt get through.
Funding Applications Recycling Bin is a collection of projects and ideas which can be updated and realised.
When we want to scale our project and seek for funding funding bodies often can't tell us what was wrong with the application and why it didnt get through.
Funding Applications Recycling Bin is a collection of projects and ideas which can be re-mixed and re-used in a different context.

Sometimes projects get abandonned after a failed appllication for funding. Or the project gets completed, and while the results get published, it is not quite clear which elements are ok to be re-used.
Projects get abandonned after a failed appllication for funding. Or the project gets completed, and while the results get published, it is not quite clear which elements are ok to be re-used.

• Failed Funding Applications
  • Completed Projects
Open Projects Archive

Some projects and ideas get abandonned after a failed appllication for funding. Or the project gets completed, and while the results get published, it is not quite clear which elements are ok to be re-used.
It is an Open Projects Archive

Some projects and ideas get abandonned after a failed appllication for funding. Filling application forms is a stressful and boring activity. Most of us are not professional fund raisers and don't intend to become ones. We just want to build stuff valuable for our communities: develop softare tools, lanch learning activities, events, art projects etc.
Or the project gets completed, and while the results get published, it is not quite clear which elements are ok to be re-used.

Some projects and ideas get abandonned after a failed appllication for funding. Filling application forms is a stressful and boring activity. Most of us are not professional fund raisers and don't intend to become that. We just want to build stuff valuable for our communities.

• Build partnerships
  • Build stronger teams
  • Merging ideas into projects
  • Find missing links
  • Communicate common questions to funders
[[Funding Applications Recycling Bin]] is a collection of projects and ideas which can be re-mixed and re-used in a different context.
Some projects and ideas get abandonned after a failed appllication for funding.
Or the project gets completed, and while the results get published, it is not quite clear which elements are ok to be re-used.

This archive is about sharing and fair re-use. We respect privacy and value attribution. We believe that publishing ideas and project funding applications in the open doesn't interfere with privacy and attribution. Anyone submitting their idea or a project can establish their own rules of attribution, forking, and re-mixing.
[[Project Re-Mix Policy]]

story.text: [[Funding Applications Recycling Bin]] is a collection of projects and ideas which can be re-mixed and re-used in a different context.
It is an Open Projects Archive
Some projects and ideas get abandonned after a failed appllication for funding.
Or the project gets completed, and while the results get published, it is not quite clear which elements are ok to be re-used.

This archive is about sharing and fair re-use. We respect privacy and value attribution. We believe that publishing ideas and project funding applications in the open doesn't interfere with privacy and attribution. Anyone submitting their idea or a project can establish their own rules of attribution, forking, and re-mixing.
